name: Layered Chutney Dip
author: Joanne Neubauer
summary: When all of these flavors come together, your taste buds will get really excited and you'll be shoveling in some more! Serve with your favorite crackers.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) jar mango chutney (such as Major Grey®), chunks removed
1 cup shredded coconut, or to taste
½ cup chopped cashews, or to taste
4  green onions, chopped, or to taste
directions: Mix cream cheese, sour cream, and curry powder together in a bowl; spread mixture onto the middle of a plate
Top cream cheese mixture with a layer of chutney, a layer of coconut, a layer of cashews, and a layer of green onions
